message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Would you be willing to consider an even lower price?
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $115. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Would you be willing to consider an even lower price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. It's the lowest price I can accept for this product, and I think it's still a great deal. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
